ej,pricb801,M,culbf901,Arguing stadium boundary call $Reds challenged that double was actually home run; call upheld - double
$umpires reviewed call of out at first; call overturned  - single, not ground out
$Reds challenged call that Bryant was safe at second; call was overturned - caught stealing and double play
$Cubs challenged call that 3rd pitch hit batter; call was overturned - foul
$Reds challenged call that Contreras was safe at 3rd; call was overturned - out at 3rd for double play
$originally scored as E5, changed to single on 07-16-2017
$Nationals challenged call that Harper was out trying to stretch; call was upheld - out
$Reds challenged call that Gennett was out at 1st; call was overturned - single
$Reds challenged out at plate, claiming that catcher had illegally blocked the plate; call was upheld - out
$umpires reviewed call that Garcia hit triple, not home home run; call was upheld - triple
$Reds challenged call that Barnhart was out at home; call was upheld - out
$Cardinals challenged call that Pham was doubled up trying to return to 2nd; call was overturned - fly out, no DP
$Reds challenged call that Voit was safe at home; call was upheld - passed ball for run
$Reds challenged call that Voit's hit was fiar; they claimed it was fould; call was upheld - double
$Padres challenged call that Hamilton was safe on steal attempt; call was overturne - caught stealing DP
$Reds challenged call that Suarez was safe at first; call was upheld - safe on error
$Cubs challenged call that Lackey was out at 2nd on force; call was overturned - dropped catch error
$umpires reviewed Schwarber's hit to be sure it was a home run; call was upheld - home run
$Reds challenged call that Rivera was safe at 2nd; call was overturned - out at 2nd to complete reverse force DP
$Francisco Cervelli left injured leg
$Pirates challenged call that Mercer was out at 1st; call was overturned - safe for single
$Adam Frazier left with injured leg
$Mets challenged call that Reyes was out at 2nd; call was upheld - caught stealing
$Billy Hamilton left with injured hand
$Reds challenged call that Polanco was hit by pitch; call was upheld - hit by pitch
$Ivan Nova left with injured leg
$Cardinals challenged call that Weaver was out at 1st to complete double play; call was overturned - force, no DP
$Devers originally credited with double, changed to single on 09-23-2017
$Red Sox challenged call that Barnhart was safe at 1st; call was upheld - single
